title: Aouie and Elisha Wedding Invitation
description: Join us for our special day of love and celebration. Interactive wedding invitation with all the details you need.
short_message: It is with great joy and love that the families of Aouie and Elisa invite you to witness and celebrate the beginning of our forever. As we exchange our vows and start a new chapter, your presense will mean the world to us.
invite_message: Iniimbitahan po namin kayo sa aming pag-iisang dibdib.

twitter.title: Aouie and Elisha Wedding Invitation
twitter.description: Join us for our special day - 14 February 2026

location.church: Iglesia Ni Cristo, Lokal ng Malolos
location.address: 593 Diversion Rd Santa Isabel, Malolos, Bulacan
